flawed_nl_solution:
The sell reduced the price of each pin by 20*0.15=$<<20*0.15=3>>3
So he paid 20-3=$<<20-3=13>>13 per pin
So the total cost was 13*10=$<<13*10=130>>130
#### 130

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 17, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
